alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:57PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kent, southeastern Cumberland and western Cape May Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 857 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camden, or near Dover, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Cape May, Camden, Woodbine, Cheswold, West Cape May, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Cape May Court House, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Hazlettville, Dover Base Housing, Dennisville, Dover Speedway, Fortesque, Eldora, North Cape May, Rising Sun and Big Stone Beach. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 0 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May
